name: High Roller (GryphShot, Fettuccini)
description:
High Roller is a game made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam. Take on all kinds of wacky enemies in the High Roller Casino, from poker chips, to cards, heck - even shoes! How it came to this, it's had to say. But one thing's for certain... You're gonna roll the dice like there's no tomorrow!

In this game, dice act both as your health and as a way to upgrade your stats. Hold on to your dice to keep yourself safe, or roll them all at once to upgrade one of your stats, like movement speed, projectile speed, or damage. 

Get far enough, and you'll be gambling with your life against some hefty enemies. How far can you get? Play now to find out!

CONTROLS

- Look and aim with mouse

- Move with WASD

- Roll all your dice with [Space]
